record.description: University Choir, May 16, 1895: third row: C. T. Wykoff, Charles J. Chamberlain, J. H. P. Gauss, W. P. Lovett, and H. C. Hewitt; second row: Glenrose Bell, Mary L. Marot, Josephine L. Hutchings, Sarah Munson, Louise M. Hannan, Agnes S. Cook, and Mary M. Sturges; first row: P. G. Woolley, Frances Williston, and F. W. Eastman.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: News clipping. Descreened in Silverfast. USM used in Photoshop 28%, 16.3 pixels, 3 levels
